00028 PlotTDPs::PlotTDPs(modules::options* opts):
00029    BaseModule("PlotTDPs",opts){
00030        fFastCut=opts->GetDouble("fast_ch_cut",0);
00031        fSlowCut=opts->GetDouble("slow_ch_cut",0);
00032 }

00036 
00037 int PlotTDPs::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00038     // Change into this modules directory
00039     GetDirectory()->cd();
00040 
00041     // Make sure we've got MakeDetectorPulses being used
00042     MakeDetectorPulses* makeTDPs=modules::navigator::Instance()->GetModule<MakeDetectorPulses>("MakeDetectorPulses");
00043     if(!makeTDPs){
00044         cout<<"It's meaningless to use the PlotTDPs module without MakeDetectorPulses as well"<<endl;
00045         return 1;
00046     }
00047     // Make sure MakeDetectorPulses is called before PlotTDPs
00048     if(!modules::navigator::Instance()->Before("MakeDetectorPulses",GetName())){
00049         cout<<"MakeDetectorPulses must be used before PlotTDPs"<<endl;
00050         return 2;
00051     }
00052 
00053     // Init loop variables
00054     IDs::generator passThruId=makeTDPs->GetPassThruGeneratorID();
00055     Detector_t tmp;
00056     std::string name;
00057     std::string title;
00058     std::stringstream full_title;
00059 
00060     // Loop over all TDP sources
00061     for(SourceDetPulseMap::const_iterator i_source=gDetectorPulseMap.begin();
00062             i_source!= gDetectorPulseMap.end(); ++i_source){
00063 
00064         // Ignore TDP sources that use the pass-through generator (so only have
00065         // one valid input channel, like a scintillator or the muScA)
00066         if(i_source->first==passThruId){
00067             cout<<"Skipping TDP source, '"<<i_source->first<<"' as it was made with the pass-through generator"<<endl;
00068             continue;
00069         }
00070 
00071         // make the name and title for the histogram
00072         name='h'+i_source->first.str();
00073         modules::parser::ToCppValid(name);
00074         title=" coming from ";
00075         title+=i_source->first.str();
00076         if(Debug()) {
00077             cout<<"Made histogram called "<<name<<" with title "<< title<<endl;
00078         }
00079 
00080         // Make a histogram of the relative amplitudes
00081         tmp.amplitudes=new TH2F((name+"_amp").c_str(),("Amplitudes of TDPs "+title).c_str(), 100,0,1000,100,0,1000);
00082         tmp.amplitudes->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00083         tmp.amplitudes->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00084         tmp.amplitudes->SetYTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00085 
00086         // Histogram amplitudes for pulses not in either channel
00087         tmp.fast_only_amps=new TH1F((name+"_fast_only_amp").c_str(),
00088                 ("Amplitudes of hits with no corresponding slow pulse "+title).c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00089         tmp.fast_only_amps->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00090         tmp.fast_only_amps->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00091 
00092         // Histogram amplitudes for pulses not in either channel
00093         tmp.slow_only_amps=new TH1F((name+"_slow_only_amp").c_str(),
00094                 ("Amplitudes of hits with no corresponding fast pulse "+title).c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00095         tmp.slow_only_amps->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00096         tmp.slow_only_amps->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00097 
00098         // Histogram amplitudes for fast pulses with a slow pulse cut
00099         full_title.str("");
00100         full_title<<"Amplitudes of fast pulses for slow pulses with amplitudes above ";
00101         full_title<<fFastCut;
00102         tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut=new TH1F((name+"_slow_amp_fast_cut").c_str(),
00103                 full_title.str().c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00104         tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00105         tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00106 
00107         // Histogram amplitudes for slow pulses with a fast pulse cut
00108         full_title.str("");
00109         full_title<<"Amplitudes of slow pulses for fast pulses with amplitudes above ";
00110         full_title<<fSlowCut;
00111         tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut=new TH1F((name+"_fast_amps_slow_cut").c_str(),
00112                 full_title.str().c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00113         tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00114         tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00115 
00116         // Make a histogram of the time difference between pulses
00117         tmp.time_diff=NULL;
00118 
00119         // Add tmp to the list of TDPs to draw
00120         fPlotsList[i_source->first]=tmp;
00121     }
00122 
00123     // Change back to the top level directory
00124     GetDirectory()->cd("/");
00125   return 0;
00126 }
00127 
00128 int PlotTDPs::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00129 
00130     // For each TDP source of interest (defined in BeforeFirstEntry)
00131     const DetectorPulseList* pulseList;
00132     SourceDetPulseMap::const_iterator i_pulse_list;
00133     double fast_amp, slow_amp;
00134     for(PlotsList_t::iterator i_source=fPlotsList.begin();
00135             i_source!=fPlotsList.end(); ++i_source){
00136         // Get the desired pulse list
00137         i_pulse_list=gDetectorPulseMap.find(i_source->first);
00138         if(i_pulse_list== gDetectorPulseMap.end()){
00139             cout<<"Unable to find TDP list for source, "<<i_source->first<<endl;
00140             return 1;
00141         }
00142         pulseList=&i_pulse_list->second;
00143 
00144         // Loop over the pulse list
00145         for(DetectorPulseList::const_iterator i_pulse=pulseList->begin();
00146                 i_pulse!=pulseList->end(); ++i_pulse){
00147 
00148             // get the amplitudes for each pulse
00149             fast_amp=(*i_pulse)->GetAmplitude(TDetectorPulse::kFast);
00150             slow_amp=(*i_pulse)->GetAmplitude(TDetectorPulse::kSlow);
00151 
00152             // If one of the channels is the default value then fill the
00153             // histogram for channels that weren't matched
00154             if(fast_amp==definitions::DefaultValue){
00155                 i_source->second.slow_only_amps->Fill(slow_amp);
00156             }else if(slow_amp==definitions::DefaultValue){
00157                 i_source->second.fast_only_amps->Fill(fast_amp);
00158             }else {
00159                 // Both channels saw hits, fill the 2d plot
00160                 i_source->second.amplitudes->Fill(fast_amp ,slow_amp);
00161             }
00162 
00163             // Fill the cut histograms
00164             if(fast_amp> fFastCut && slow_amp!=definitions::DefaultValue){
00165                 i_source->second.slow_amps_fast_cut->Fill(slow_amp);
00166             }
00167             if(slow_amp> fSlowCut && fast_amp!=definitions::DefaultValue){
00168                 i_source->second.fast_amps_slow_cut->Fill(fast_amp);
00169             }
00170 
00171             // Fill histogram of the time difference between pulses
00172         }
00173     }
00174 
00175     return 0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 int PlotTDPs::AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00179     // Draw and save all histograms
00180     for(PlotsList_t::iterator i_source=fPlotsList.begin();
00181             i_source!=fPlotsList.end(); ++i_source){
00182         i_source->second.amplitudes->Draw();
00183         i_source->second.slow_only_amps->Draw();
00184         i_source->second.fast_only_amps->Draw();
00185         i_source->second.fast_amps_slow_cut->Draw();
00186         i_source->second.slow_amps_fast_cut->Draw();
00187     }
00188 
00189   return 0;
00190 }

00192 ALCAP_REGISTER_MODULE(PlotTDPs,slow_ch_cut,fast_ch_cut);
